Standard options.name: FILE
Standard options.title: Logfile
Standard options.description: Log tests and output to FILE

Standard options.title: Disable logging
Standard options.description: Do not log configure debug information

Standard options.title: Fatal warnings
Standard options.description: Fail if any configure warning is generated

Standard options.title: Enable rpath
Standard options.description: Use rpath to allow installing libraries in paths not part of the dynamic linker search path use rpath when linking programs (USE WITH CARE)

Standard options.name: DIR
Standard options.title: Install name dir
Standard options.description: Darwin directory name for installed targets

Licensing options.title: Enable gpl
Licensing options.description: Allow use of GPL code, the resulting libs and binaries will be under GPL

Licensing options.title: Enable nonfree
Licensing options.description: Allow use of nonfree code, the resulting libs and binaries will be unredistributable

Configuration options.title: Enable small
Configuration options.description: Optimize for size instead of speed

Configuration options.title: Disable runtime cpudetect
Configuration options.description: Disable detecting CPU capabilities at runtime (smaller binary)

Configuration options.title: Disable swscale alpha
Configuration options.description: Disable alpha channel support in swscale

Configuration options.title: Disable all
Configuration options.description: Disable building components, libraries and programs

Program options.title: Disable programs
Program options.description: Do not build command line programs

Documentation options.title: Disable htmlpages
Documentation options.description: Do not build HTML documentation pages

Documentation options.title: Disable manpages
Documentation options.description: Do not build man documentation pages

Documentation options.title: Disable podpages
Documentation options.description: Do not build POD documentation pages

Documentation options.title: Disable txtpages
Documentation options.description: Do not build text documentation pages

Component options.title: Disable iamf
Component options.description: Disable support for Immersive Audio Model

External library support.description:
Using any of the following switches will allow FFmpeg to link to the corresponding external library. All the components depending on that library will become enabled, if all their other dependencies are met and they are not explicitly disabled. E.g. --enable-libopus will enable linking to libopus and allow the libopus encoder to be built, unless it is specifically disabled with --disable-encoder=libopus.

Note that only the system libraries are auto-detected. All the other external libraries must be explicitly enabled.

Also note that the following help text describes the purpose of the libraries themselves, not all their features will necessarily be usable by FFmpeg.

External library support.title: Enable avisynth
External library support.description: Enable reading of AviSynth script files

External library support.title: Enable gcrypt
External library support.description: Enable gcrypt, needed for rtmp(t)e support if openssl, librtmp or gmp is not used

External library support.title: Enable gmp
External library support.description: Enable gmp, needed for rtmp(t)e support if openssl or librtmp is not used

External library support.title: Enable gnutls
External library support.description: Enable gnutls, needed for https support if openssl, libtls or mbedtls is not used

External library support.title: Enable lcms2
External library support.description: Enable ICC profile support via LittleCMS 2

External library support.title: Enable libaom
External library support.description: Enable AV1 video encoding/decoding via libaom

External library support.title: Enable libaribb24
External library support.description: Enable ARIB text and caption decoding via libaribb24

External library support.title: Enable libaribcaption
External library support.description: Enable ARIB text and caption decoding via libaribcaption

External library support.title: Enable libass
External library support.description: Enable libass subtitles rendering, needed for subtitles and ass filter

External library support.title: Enable libcdio
External library support.description: Enable audio CD grabbing with libcdio

External library support.title: Enable libdc1394
External library support.description: Enable IIDC-1394 grabbing using libdc1394 and libraw1394

External library support.title: Enable libdvdnav
External library support.description: Enable libdvdnav, needed for DVD demuxing

External library support.title: Enable libdvdread
External library support.description: Enable libdvdread, needed for DVD demuxing

External library support.title: Enable libflite
External library support.description: Enable flite (voice synthesis) support via libflite

External library support.title: Enable libfontconfig
External library support.description: Enable libfontconfig, useful for drawtext filter

External library support.title: Enable libfreetype
External library support.description: Enable libfreetype, needed for drawtext filter

External library support.title: Enable libharfbuzz
External library support.description: Enable libharfbuzz, needed for drawtext filter

External library support.title: Enable libgme
External library support.description: Enable Game Music Emu via libgme

External library support.title: Enable libjxl
External library support.description: Enable JPEG XL de/encoding via libjxl

External library support.title: Enable libopenmpt
External library support.description: Enable decoding tracked files via libopenmpt

External library support.title: Enable libopenvino
External library support.description: Enable OpenVINO as a DNN module backend for DNN based filters like dnn_processing

External library support.title: Enable libqrencode
External library support.description: Enable QR encode generation via libqrencode

External library support.title: Enable librubberband
External library support.description: Enable rubberband needed for rubberband filter

External library support.title: Enable libshine
External library support.description: Enable fixed-point MP3 encoding via libshine

External library support.title: Enable libsnappy
External library support.description: Enable Snappy compression, needed for hap encoding

External library support.title: Enable libsrt
External library support.description: Enable Haivision SRT protocol via libsrt

External library support.title: Enable libtensorflow
External library support.description: Enable TensorFlow as a DNN module backend for DNN based filters like sr

External library support.title: Enable libtesseract
External library support.description: Enable Tesseract, needed for ocr filter

External library support.title: Enable libtls
External library support.description: Enable LibreSSL (via libtls), needed for https support if openssl, gnutls or mbedtls is not used

External library support.title: Enable libtorch
External library support.description: Enable Torch as one DNN backend

External library support.title: Enable libvorbis
External library support.description: Enable Vorbis en/decoding via libvorbis, native implementation exists

External library support.title: Enable libvpx
External library support.description: Enable VP8 and VP9 de/encoding via libvpx

External library support.title: Enable libxvid
External library support.description: Enable Xvid encoding via xvidcore, native MPEG-4/Xvid encoder exists

External library support.title: Enable libxml2
External library support.description: Enable XML parsing using the C library libxml2, needed for dash and imf demuxing support

External library support.title: Enable libzimg
External library support.description: Enable z.lib, needed for zscale filter

External library support.title: Enable mbedtls
External library support.description: Enable mbedTLS, needed for https support if openssl, gnutls or libtls is not used

External library support.title: Enable libmysofa
External library support.description: Enable libmysofa, needed for sofalizer filter

External library support.title: Enable openssl
External library support.description: Enable openssl, needed for https support if gnutls, libtls or mbedtls is not used

External library support.title: Enable pocketsphinx
External library support.description: Enable PocketSphinx, needed for asr filter

External library support.title: Disable schannel
External library support.description: Disable SChannel SSP, needed for TLS support on Windows if openssl and gnutls are not used

External library support.title: Disable securetransport
External library support.description: Disable Secure Transport, needed for TLS support on OSX if openssl and gnutls are not used

The following libraries provide various.title: Disable d3d11va
The following libraries provide various.description: Disable Microsoft Direct3D 11 video acceleration code

The following libraries provide various.title: Disable d3d12va
The following libraries provide various.description: Disable Microsoft Direct3D 12 video acceleration code

The following libraries provide various.title: Disable dxva2
The following libraries provide various.description: Disable Microsoft DirectX 9 video acceleration code

The following libraries provide various.title: Enable libmfx
The following libraries provide various.description: Enable Intel MediaSDK (AKA Quick Sync Video) code via libmfx

The following libraries provide various.title: Enable libvpl
The following libraries provide various.description: Enable Intel oneVPL code via libvpl if libmfx is not used

The following libraries provide various.title: Enable mmal
The following libraries provide various.description: Enable Broadcom Multi-Media Abstraction Layer (Raspberry Pi) via MMAL

The following libraries provide various.title: Disable nvdec
The following libraries provide various.description: Disable Nvidia video decoding acceleration (via hwaccel)

The following libraries provide various.title: Enable omx rpi
The following libraries provide various.description: Enable OpenMAX IL code for Raspberry Pi

The following libraries provide various.title: Enable rkmpp
The following libraries provide various.description: Enable Rockchip Media Process Platform code

The following libraries provide various.title: Disable vaapi
The following libraries provide various.description: Disable Video Acceleration API (mainly Unix/Intel) code

The following libraries provide various.title: Disable vdpau
The following libraries provide various.description: Disable Nvidia Video Decode and Presentation API for Unix code

Toolchain options.name: DIR
Toolchain options.title: Target samples
Toolchain options.description: Path to samples directory on target

Toolchain options.name: PATH
Toolchain options.title: Tempprefix
Toolchain options.description: Force fixed dir/prefix instead of mktemp for checks

Toolchain options.name: NAME

Toolchain options.description: Set tool defaults according to NAME (gcc-asan, clang-asan, gcc-msan, clang-msan, gcc-tsan, clang-tsan, gcc-usan, clang-usan, valgrind-massif, valgrind-memcheck, msvc, icl, gcov, llvm-cov, hardened)

Toolchain options.name: NVCC

Toolchain options.description: Use Nvidia CUDA compiler NVCC or clang

Toolchain options.name: DOXYGEN

Toolchain options.description: Use DOXYGEN to generate API doc

Toolchain options.name: HCFLAGS
Toolchain options.title: Host cflags
Toolchain options.description: Use HCFLAGS when compiling for host

Toolchain options.name: HCPPFLAGS
Toolchain options.title: Host cppflags
Toolchain options.description: Use HCPPFLAGS when compiling for host

Toolchain options.name: HLDFLAGS
Toolchain options.title: Host ldflags
Toolchain options.description: Use HLDFLAGS when linking for host

Toolchain options.name: HLIBS
Toolchain options.title: Host extralibs
Toolchain options.description: Use libs HLIBS when linking for host

Advanced options (experts only).name: PREFIX
Advanced options (experts only).title: Malloc prefix
Advanced options (experts only).description: Prefix malloc and related names with PREFIX

Advanced options (experts only).title: Enable hardcoded tables
Advanced options (experts only).description: Use hardcoded tables instead of runtime generation

Advanced options (experts only).title: Disable safe bitstream reader
Advanced options (experts only).description: Disable buffer boundary checking in bitreaders (faster, but may crash)

Advanced options (experts only).description: The max filter size swscale uses

Optimization options (experts only).title: Disable x86asm

Optimization options (experts only).title: Disable mipsdspr2
Optimization options (experts only).description: Disable MIPS DSP ASE R2 optimizations

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Disable debug
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Disable debugging symbols

Developer options (useful when working o.name: LEVEL
Developer options (useful when working o.title: Enable debug
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Set the debug level

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Disable optimizations
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Disable compiler optimizations

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Enable extra warnings
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Enable more compiler warnings

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Disable stripping
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Disable stripping of executables and shared libraries

Developer options (useful when working o.name: level
Developer options (useful when working o.title: Assert level
Developer options (useful when working o.description: 0(default), 1 or 2, amount of assertion testing, 2 causes a slowdown at runtime.

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Enable memory poisoning
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Fill heap uninitialized allocated space with arbitrary data

Developer options (useful when working o.name: VALGRIND
Developer options (useful when working o.title: Valgrind
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Run "make fate" tests through valgrind to detect memory leaks and errors, using the specified valgrind binary. Cannot be combined with --target-exec

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Enable ftrapv
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Trap arithmetic overflows

Developer options (useful when working o.name: PATH
Developer options (useful when working o.title: Samples
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Location of test samples for FATE, if not set use $FATE_SAMPLES at make invocation time.

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Enable neon clobber test
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Check NEON registers for clobbering (should be used only for debugging purposes)

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Enable xmm clobber test
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Check XMM registers for clobbering (Win64-only; should be used only for debugging purposes)

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Enable random
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Randomly enable/disable components

Developer options (useful when working o.name: LIST
Developer options (useful when working o.title: Enable random
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Randomly enable/disable specific components or

Developer options (useful when working o.name: LIST
Developer options (useful when working o.title: Disable random
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Component groups. LIST is a comma-separated list of NAME[:PROB] entries where NAME is a component (group) and PROB the probability associated with NAME (default 0.5).

Developer options (useful when working o.name: VALUE
Developer options (useful when working o.title: Random seed
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Seed value for --enable/disable-random

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Disable valgrind backtrace
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Do not print a backtrace under Valgrind (only applies to --disable-optimizations builds)

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Enable ossfuzz
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Enable building fuzzer tool

Developer options (useful when working o.name: PATH
Developer options (useful when working o.title: Libfuzzer
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Path to libfuzzer

Developer options (useful when working o.name: TESTS
Developer options (useful when working o.title: Ignore tests
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Comma-separated list (without "fate-" prefix in the name) of tests whose result is ignored

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Enable linux perf
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Enable Linux Performance Monitor API

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Enable macos kperf
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Enable macOS kperf (private) API

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Disable large tests
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Disable tests that use a large amount of memory

Developer options (useful when working o.title: Disable ptx compression
Developer options (useful when working o.description: Don't compress CUDA PTX code even when possible
